pages.text: When you came up with its name, you really meant it.$(br)The Omni-Accelerator is loaded with items or blocks and can shoot them at a distance.$(br)Blocks are placed and the poor thing that gets hit by your flying items receives its effects. All it needed was a powerful energy source in the form of a $(l:resources/moonstone_cores)Moonstone Core$().
Sharp Dripstone is not the only thing that can be used as a projectile. There are some... $(italic)interesting$()... things you can do with this fun toy if you load it correctly.
